artist: Painter: After Alessandro Tiarini; Engraver: Francesco Rosaspina
description: Mary seated upper left holding Jesus by her side with left arm and holding hands with woman at right; St. Joseph seated at her feet; cherubs and children around him; arche interior with drapery at left and a window at right
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

below image in black: A. Tiarini dip   F. Rosaspina disine / MARIA VERGINE, GESU BAMBINO, S. GUISEPPI | on sheet in pencil: 2-472
title: Virgin Mary, Chils Jesus and Saint Joseph
